title: Dreams Asleep
description: Blood, lies, and secrets face Kieran and Anya as their story concludes in the gripping sequel to Dreams Awake!  With Anya's life in peril, Kieran's desperation drives him to do the last thing he ever wanted: call on his three estranged brothers for help.  But from the moment Kieran and Anya arrive at his brothers' home, Kieran can tell something isn't right. His brothers are pale shadows of how he remembers them. As they reunite, decade-old secrets come spilling out, and nothing is as it seems.  One thing, however, remains clear: Anya's nightmare will do anything to keep her...and Kieran's family will do anything to keep him.   This fantasy romance contains mature content.
author: Amanda Dery
